Change Log
==========

v.0.2.1 (2012-12-31)

* removed code-blocks from README so that PyPI would render the readme correctly.

v0.2 (2012-12-31)

* added invalidate() method.
* added documentation.
* added *override* switch to the get() method.

v0.1 (2012-12-30)
-----------------

* Initial release.
